name: Crop Drop (Robo_Chiz)
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/$315060

Crop Drop is a farming puzzle game. Split into two phases, the player is tasked with planting seeds at night, and harvesting their crops during the day. Planning is everything; empty fields may grow weeds if you don’t plant any seeds. Weeds cannot be removed once they enter your fields.

Aim for a highscore!
